messages.content:
Let's play in a video game combinator.
+ is combining two games.
- is subtracting features of one game from another.

Silent Hill + Breath of the Wild =

A survival horror game set in a vast open world. The player would explore the creepy and atmospheric town of Silent Hill, while also exploring the vast wilderness beyond its borders. The game would feature the combination of features from both games, such as the tense atmosphere and puzzle-solving of Silent Hill, and the open-world exploration and combat of Breath of the Wild. The player would have to use their wits and resources to survive in this frightening new world.

Let's play in a video game combinator.
+ is combining two games.
- is subtracting features of one game from another.

Silent Hill + Breath of the Wild = Put here title of game

And don't do nothing else
The title of the game would be "Silent Hill: Breath of the Wild"

Let's play in a video game combinator.
+ is combining two games.
- is subtracting features of one game from another.

Silent Hill + Breath of the Wild = Put here the title of a real existing game

And don't do anything else
The title of the existing game that Silent Hill and Breath of the Wild could be combined to create would be "Silent Wilderness"
